alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 1:50PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow can be expected through this evening across portions of the White Mountains. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches above 6000 feet. Wind gusts to 40 mph at times will cause blowing snow and low visibilities. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
